Text:
I am Portuguese.
This is to thank all Finnish people that approved the bailout and tell you:

1) Almost all Portuguese citizens are serious people, concerned with Portugal and its obligations;

2) The real CANCER lies on the politicians: 
THEY SHOULD "ALL" BE TAKEN TO JUSTICE!!!! AND STAY IMPRISONED FOR LIFE!!!! 

With LOVE from PORTUGAL.
Thanks Mad Parrot for these cool Marlene Deitrich films, "The Blue Angel" is one of my favorite films of all time!
